Reviews.Title: “won't get what you paid for!”

Reviews.Content: booked paid online overseas description specifically king size bed single rollout beds pushed kept moving apart youre brought reception unhelpful rude abrupt changed beds staff unfriendly unhelpful including housekeeping dirty linen looked toiletries shampoo conditioner bathroom half requested ones repeatedly none hotel definitely located inconvenient spot city pay transport city worth staying

Reviews.Content: hotel extremely city sights reliable public transportation charge shuttle service claims rome city center takes piazza vatican rome wireless internet ridiculously expensive 72 euro 7 day stay 1080 euro day hotel regards amenities location advice money save staying spent transportation utter frustration pay little stay closer hotel nice rome isnt stay
